description: Social interactions, family conversations, and personal relationship phrases

phrases.exampleSentence: Sveiki! Kaip sekasi darbai? Ar patinka nauja vieta?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Hello! How is work going? Do you like the new place?

phrases.english: Would you like to have coffee?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar norėtumėte išgerti kavos rytoj? Galėtume susitikti centre.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Would you like to have coffee tomorrow? We could meet downtown.

phrases.exampleSentence: Kaip jūsų šeima? Ar vaikai gerai mokosi mokykloje?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: How is your family? Are the children doing well in school?

phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galiu jums padėti? Matau, kad kažko ieškote.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can I help you? I see you're looking for something.

phrases.exampleSentence: Mes turime susitikti dažniau. Gal kas savaitę?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: We should meet more often. Maybe once a week?

phrases.exampleSentence: Po to sunkaus laikotarpio, kaip laikaisi?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: After that difficult period, how are you holding up?

phrases.english: Do you have plans for the weekend?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar turite planų savaitgaliui? Gal norėtumėte važiuoti į gamtą?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Do you have plans for the weekend? Maybe you'd like to go to nature?

phrases.exampleSentence: Su gimtadieniu! Linkiu sveikatos ir laimės!
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Happy birthday! I wish you health and happiness!

phrases.exampleSentence: Mes pasiilgome jūsų per šias atostogas. Kaip sekėsi?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: We missed you during this vacation. How did it go?
